title: Physical Therapy Leadership Development Training Program: Design Based on the ADDIE Model

context.prior_knowledge: Advanced theoretical knowledge and mastery of high-level application skills
context.additional_context: Aims to strengthen leadership competencies in healthcare, providing hands-on, participatory learning environments

learning_goals: Learners can explain at least three conflict management strategies within physical therapy teams
Learners can design effective decision-making processes in healthcare organizations through case analysis
Learners can present treatment planning approaches applying patient-centered leadership models
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
